attributes.action: thoroughly investigate the Glazer Family's conduct since purchasing Manchester United
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Especially their demand to make the Automatic Cup Ticket Scheme compulsory. We are deeply concerned that the compulsory scheme disenfranchises many ordinary life long fans who will no longer have the economic means to continue to buy additional Cup tickets at an increased price and support Man Utd.
